content.text:
# Robert J. Trumpler Award

The Robert J. Trumpler Award of the Astronomical Society of the Pacific is given annually to a recent recipient of the Ph.D degree whose thesis is judged particularly significant to astronomy. The award is named after Robert Julius Trumpler, a notable Swiss-American astronomer (1886â€“1956).
Previous award winners
Source: [https://astrosociety.org/who-we-are/awards/robert-j-trumpler-award.html/title/past-recipients-and-granting-institutions ASP]
* 2019 Katheryn Decker French, University of Arizona
* 2020 Gudmundur Kari Stefansson, The Pennsylvania State University
* 2021 Jane Huang, Harvard University
* 2022 Ariadna Murguia-Berthier, University of California, Santa Cruz
* 2023 Deborah Lokhorst, University of Toronto
}}
